column2: "As gatekeepers, we can't afford to let our guard down. There's no telling when DOLLS might attack."
"We must devote ourselves entirely to protecting Central City."
"Hm... I know that look in your eyes. You seek even greater strength, don't you?"
"Very well, shall I teach you a suitable training method?"
"My training involves tending to Resol Forest and single-mindedly cutting down as many enemies as you can."
"That place is swarming with danger and hostility. Spend long enough in there, and you're sure to see a marked improvement."
"Head to Resol Forest. Immerse yourself in your training."
"Hm... I'm impressed with how you fight. Looks like you've become stronger, too."
"I'll be keeping my eye on you. Continue to immerse yourself in your training, and don't miss a day of it."
"Hm, very well. Come back if you change your mind."
